item.title: Pi√±atas
item.description: You can translate Minimo in your own language! For example, if you want to translate Minimo in Spanish, you will have to add this to your site's config file: [languages.es] lang = "es" languageName = "Spanish" weight = 1 Then create a folder named /i18n/ in your site's root. And create a file /i18n/es.toml with the translated strings. For reference template you can see the en.toml file. If you want your translation file to be included in Minimo repository, feel free to create a pull request.
